slots.title: 🎰 Slot Machine Royale
slots.noChipsLeft: Not enough chips for this bet!
slots.noWins: No wins this spin - Try again!
slots.basicControlsText:
• Click "Buy chips" to purchase betting chips
• Select chip denomination at the bottom
• Your bet per line equals your chip denomination
• Click SPIN to start the reels
• Win by matching symbols on paylines
slots.paylinesInfoText:
• 5 active paylines (colored lines)
• Match 2+ symbols from left to right
• Total bet = Chip denomination × 5 paylines
• Higher denominations = Higher payouts
